name: raycast-displayplacer
title: Displayplacer
description: Apply pre-defined display arrangement using displayplacer.
author: nanamiiiii

commands.name: apply-profile
commands.title: Apply Display Profile
commands.description: Apply pre-defined display arrangement using displayplacer.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1

preferences.name: configfile
preferences.title: Configuration File
preferences.description: Specify configuration file not in the default location (i.e. ~/.config/raycast-displayplacer/config.yml)

preferences.name: executable
preferences.title: Location of displayplacer executable
preferences.description: Specify displayplacer executable path if it is not in PATH.
